original_text: So they took the money, and did as they were taught: and this saying is commonly reported among the Jews until this day.
korean_text: 군인들이 돈을 받고 가르친 대로 하였으니 이 말이 오늘날까지 유대인 가운데 두루 퍼지니라

sentences.original_text: and did as they were taught
and this saying is commonly reported
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이 말은 널리 알려지고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: among the Jews until this day
